description: This file contains a self-invoking function that defines underscore.js's template module, initializes Google Analytics, and includes functions for redirecting, fetching files, and loading a 'Learn' JSON configuration with associated DOM manipulations and GitHub issue fetching.

classes.name: Learn
classes.description: A constructor function for loading and displaying learning-related information, including templates and GitHub issues.

methods.name: Learn.prototype.append
methods.description: Appends a learn information block to the DOM, customizing links based on backend or local demo links.

methods.name: Learn.prototype.fetchIssueCount
methods.description: Fetches the number of open issues from GitHub API and updates the DOM accordingly.
